short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Powerful Extraction Tool for extract emails and contact numbers from the Facebook.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this powerful extension, you can extract emails from facebook with only one click. 
its easy to use: 
first download the extension 
then open a facebook page 
finally click download button.
all emails of that page will be downloded as txt file.
